data: Welcome friend! Let's get you connected to hx.finance in just a few clicks.
data.which-wallets-work-#Which Wallets Work?:
Good news - if you've used DeFi before, your wallet probably works! We support:
MetaMask ğŸ¦Š (Most popular - our top pick!)
WalletConnect ğŸ”µ (Works with 100+ wallets)
Coinbase Wallet ğŸ’™ (Not the exchange, the wallet app)
Rainbow ğŸŒˆ (Beautiful and user-friendly)
Trust Wallet ğŸ›¡ï¸ (Great mobile option)
Don't have a wallet yet? No worries! Get MetaMask here - it takes 2 minutes.
data.step-1-visit-hxfinance-#Step 1: Visit hx: Head over to hx.finance. Bookmark it to avoid phishing sites!
data.step-2-click-connect-wallet-#Step 2: Cli: Look for the connect button in the top right corner. Can't miss it!
data.step-3-choose-your-wallet-#Step 3: Choos: A menu will pop up with wallet options. Pick yours!Pro tip: If using MetaMask on mobile, open hx.finance inside the MetaMask browser.
data.step-4-add-hyperliquid-network-#Step 4::
First time on Hyperliquid? No problem! If the network isn't added yet, we'll help you add it automatically.What you'll see:
A popup asking to add Hyperliquid network
Just click "Approve" - we handle the rest!
Network Details (for the curious):
data.step-5-approve-connection-#Step 5: Appro:
Your wallet will ask: "Connect to hx.finance?"
Check the URL is correct
Click "Connect" or "Approve"
That's it!
data.step-6-youre-in-#Step 6: You're In! ğŸ‰:
Success! You'll see your address in the top right, something like: 0x1234...5678What you can do now:
View your balances
Start swapping
Provide liquidity
Earn points!
data.wallet-wont-connect-#\"Wallet won't conn:
Try this:
Refresh the page (Ctrl+R or Cmd+R)
Clear your browser cache
Try a different browser
Make sure your wallet is unlocked
data.wrong-network-#\"Wrong network\" ğŸ”„:
Easy fix:
Click the network name in your wallet
Select "Hyperliquid"
If not there, add it manually with the details above
data.need-hype-for-gas-#\"Need HYPE for gas?\:
You'll need a tiny bit of HYPE for transactions:
0.1 HYPE is plenty to start
Gas fees are super cheap (usually < $0.01)
Check out how to get HYPE
data.the-golden-rules#The Golden Rules::
NEVER share your seed phrase - Not even with "support"
Always check the URL - Only use https://hx.finance
Look for the padlock ğŸ”’ - In your browser bar
Bookmark the real site - Avoid phishing
data.red-flags-#Red Flags ğŸš©:
Watch out for:
DMs asking for your seed phrase
"hx-finance.com" or similar fake URLs
Pop-ups asking for private keys
Too-good-to-be-true offers
data.mobile-users-#Mobile Users ğŸ“±:
For best mobile experience:
Use your wallet's built-in browser
Or use WalletConnect for seamless connection
Everything works great on mobile!
data.youre-all-set-#You're All Set! ğŸŠ:
Connected successfully? Amazing! You're ready to:
Get HYPE for gas - You'll need this
Make your first swap - Start earning points
Join our Discord - Say hi to the community!
Pro tip: The first connection is always the hardest. After this, your wallet will remember hx.finance! ğŸ§

data: Ready to join the hx.finance family? Let's make your first trade together!
data.quick-check---you-ready-#Quick Check - Y:
Before we dive in, make sure you've got:
Wallet connected â†’ Need help?
Some HYPE for gas â†’ Get some here
Tokens to trade â†’ WHYPE, USDE, or any supported token
Got everything? Let's go! ğŸš€
data.step-1-head-to-the-swap-page-#Step 1: He: Jump over to hx.finance/swap - this is where the magic happens!
data.step-2-pick-your-tokens-#Step 2: Pick Yo:
Time to choose what you're trading!The "From" Token (what you're selling)
Click the top dropdown
Pick from your wallet or search
Pro tip: WHYPE/USDE is perfect for first-timers!
The "To" Token (what you're buying)
Click the bottom dropdown
Choose your destination token
The app only shows available pairs (no dead ends!)
data.step-3-how-much-#Step 3: How Much? ğŸ’°:
Here's the cool part - you can enter EITHER:
The amount you want to sell (top box), OR
The amount you want to buy (bottom box)
The other one fills in automatically. It's like magic, but it's just math! âœ¨
data.step-4-the-important-stuff-#Step 4: The:
Before you hit that button, take a quick peek at:Exchange Rate ğŸ’±
Shows you exactly what you're getting (e.g., 1 WHYPE = 50.25 USDE)Price Impact ğŸ“Š
Green (< 0.1%) = You're golden!
Yellow (0.1-1%) = Still good!
Orange (1-3%) = Maybe split this trade up?
Red (> 3%) = Whoa there, big spender!
Network Fee â›½
Usually less than $0.01. Yes, really!
data.step-5-optional-settings-ï¸#Step 5: Opti:
Feeling adventurous? Click the gear icon:
Slippage: How much price movement you'll accept (default 0.5% is usually fine)
Deadline: How long before the trade expires (30 mins default)
data.step-6-swap-it-#Step 6: Swap It! ğŸ¯:
This is it! The big moment!
Hit that beautiful "Swap" button
Review everything one more time
Click "Confirm Swap"
data.step-7-wallet-time-#Step 7: Wallet Time:
Your wallet will pop up asking for approval:
Double-check the details (always good practice!)
Check the gas fee (should be tiny)
Hit "Confirm"
data.step-8-victory-#Step 8: Victory! ğŸŠ:
Boom! You did it!
Transaction confirms quickly
Your new tokens appear in your wallet
You just earned your first points!
data.lets-try-an-example-together-#Let's Try:
Say you want to swap 10 WHYPE for USDE:
Easy peasy, right?
data.start-small-think-big#Start Small, Think: Your first swap doesn't need to be huge. Even $10 helps you learn the ropes!
data.watch-that-impact#Watch That Impact: Keep price impact under 1% for the best rates. Big trades? Split 'em up!
data.points--future-hx#Points = Future $HX: Every dollar swapped = 0.01 points. It adds up fast!
data.gas-is-basically-free#Gas is Basically F: Seriously, we're talking pennies here. Hyperliquid is amazing like that.
data.insufficient-balance#\"Insufficient Bala:
Check you have enough tokens (including gas!)
Remember: HYPE â‰  WHYPE
data.price-impact-too-high#\"Price Impact Too:
Your trade is too big for the pool
Solution: Trade a smaller amount
data.transaction-failed#\"Transaction Failed\:
Usually means slippage is too low
Bump it up to 1% and try again
data.whats-next-#What's Next? ğŸŒŸ:
Congrats, you're officially part of the hx.finance family! Ready for more?
Learn About Liquidity - Earn fees from trades
Understand Points - Maximize your rewards
Join Discord - Meet other traders
Remember: Every expert was once a beginner. You're doing great! ğŸ’œ

data: To use hx.finance, you'll need HYPE for gas fees and WHYPE (Wrapped HYPE) for trading. This guide explains how to get both.
data.understanding-hype-vs-whype#Understandin:
HYPE: The native token of Hyperliquid, used for gas fees
WHYPE: Wrapped HYPE, an ERC-20 version used for trading on hx.finance
1 HYPE = 1 WHYPE (always)
data.option-1-bridge-from-ethereum-recommende:
Visit the Hyperliquid Bridge
Connect your wallet on Ethereum
Enter the amount of ETH to bridge
Approve and confirm the transaction
Wait ~10 minutes for the bridge to complete
You'll receive HYPE on Hyperliquid
data.option-2-buy-on-a-cex#Option 2: Buy on a:
Several exchanges support HYPE:
Binance
OKX
Bybit
Gate.io
After purchasing, withdraw directly to your Hyperliquid address.
data.option-3-otc-or-p2p#Option 3: OTC or P2P:
Ask in the Hyperliquid Discord
Use trusted OTC desks
Always verify addresses before sending
data.converting-hype-to-whype#Converting HYPE: Once you have HYPE, you need to wrap it to trade on hx.finance:
data.method-1-using-hxfinance-interface#Metho:
Go to hx.finance
Click "Wrap" in the top menu
Enter the amount of HYPE to wrap
Click "Wrap HYPE"
Confirm the transaction
data.method-2-direct-contract-interaction#Met:
For advanced users, you can interact directly with the WHYPE contract:
WHYPE Address: 0x5555555555555555555555555555555555555555
data.for-trading#For Trading:
Minimum: 0.1 HYPE for gas + whatever you want to trade
Recommended: 1+ HYPE for comfortable trading
data.for-providing-liquidity#For Providing Li:
Minimum: Enough for both tokens in your pair
Recommended: $100+ worth for meaningful positions
data.wrap-hype--whype#Wrap HYPE â†’ WHYPE:
Click "Wrap" button
Enter amount
Confirm transaction
Done! Your WHYPE appears instantly
data.unwrap-whype--hype#Unwrap WHYPE â†’ HYPE:
Click "Unwrap" button
Enter amount
Confirm transaction
Done! Your HYPE is restored
data.pro-tips#Pro Tips:
Keep some HYPE unwrapped for gas fees
Wrapping is instant and costs minimal gas
You can wrap/unwrap anytime with no fees (except gas)
WHYPE is required for all trading pairs
data.insufficient-gas#\"Insufficient Gas\":
You need HYPE (not WHYPE) for gas
Keep at least 0.01 HYPE unwrapped
data.cannot-estimate-gas#\"Cannot Estimate Ga:
Check you have enough HYPE
Try reducing the amount slightly
Refresh and try again
data.bridge-taking-too-long#Bridge Taking Too:
Ethereum â†’ Hyperliquid usually takes 10-15 minutes
Check bridge status on explorer
Contact support if over 1 hour
data.next-steps#Next Steps:
Now that you have HYPE and WHYPE:
Make your first swap
Explore available trading pairs
Learn about providing liquidity

data: Earn fees and points by providing liquidity to hx.finance pools. This guide covers everything from basics to advanced strategies.
data.what-is-liquidity-providing#What is Liqu:
As a liquidity provider (LP), you:
Deposit token pairs into pools
Enable others to trade
Earn fees from every swap
Earn points continuously
Can withdraw anytime
data.earn-trading-fees#Earn Trading Fees:
0.05% - 1% of every swap
Proportional to your share
Compounds automatically
data.earn-points#Earn Points:
0.24 points per dollar per day
Tier multipliers apply
Passive accumulation
data.support-the-ecosystem#Support the Ecosys:
Enable trading
Reduce slippage
Strengthen hx.finance
data.understanding-concentrated-liquidity#Und: Unlike traditional AMMs, hx.finance uses concentrated liquidity:
data.traditional-amm#Traditional AMM:
Liquidity spread across all prices
Capital inefficient
Lower fee earnings
data.concentrated-liquidity#Concentrated Liqu:
Focus liquidity in specific price ranges
Up to 4000x more efficient
Higher fee earnings
Requires more management
data.step-1-choose-your-pool#Step 1: Choose Y:
Navigate to the Pools pagePopular Pools:
WHYPE/USDE (High volume)
UETH/USDE (Stable earnings)
UBTC/USDE (Growing volume)
Consider:
24h Volume (Higher = More fees)
TVL (Total Value Locked)
Current APY
Your token holdings
data.step-2-click-add-liquidity#Step 2: Click: Find your chosen pool and click "Add Liquidity"
data.step-3-select-your-price-range#Step 3: S:
This is the most important decision!Full Range (Easy)
Covers all possible prices
No management needed
Lower capital efficiency
Good for beginners
Narrow Range (Advanced)
Higher fee earnings
Requires monitoring
Risk of going out of range
Best for active managers
data.step-4-choose-fee-tier#Step 4: Choose Fe:
0.05%: Stable pairs (USDE/USDC)
0.3%: Most pairs (WHYPE/USDE)
1%: Exotic/volatile pairs
data.step-5-enter-amounts#Step 5: Enter Amoun:
Balanced Deposit
Enter amount for one token
Other amount auto-calculates
Must maintain pool ratio
Custom Amounts
Possible within your range
May create unbalanced position
data.step-6-review--add#Step 6: Review & Add:
Check before confirming:
Price range set correctly
Token amounts accurate
Estimated fees/APY
Points earning rate
data.step-7-approve--confirm#Step 7: Approve:
Approve token spending (first time only)
Confirm the transaction
Receive your LP NFT
data.real-example-adding-to-whypeusde#Real Ex:
Let's add $1,000 of liquidity:Pool Selection
Pool: WHYPE/USDE 0.3%
Current Price: 1 WHYPE = 50 USDE
24h Volume: $500,000
TVL: $2,000,000
Range Selection
Current Price: 50 USDE
Lower Bound: 40 USDE (-20%)
Upper Bound: 60 USDE (+20%)
Conservative but effective
Deposit Amounts
10 WHYPE ($500)
500 USDE ($500)
Total: $1,000
Expected Returns
Daily Fees: ~$6.25 (0.625%)
Daily Points: 240 (before multipliers)
Monthly: ~$187.50 + 7,200 points
data.monitoring#Monitoring:
Check position daily
Watch price movements
Track fee earnings
Monitor point accumulation
data.when-to-adjust#When to Adjust:
Price nearing range boundaries
Significant volume changes
Better opportunities arise
Rebalancing needed
data.collecting-fees#Collecting Fees:
Fees accumulate in position
Collect anytime
No automatic distribution
Gas efficient to batch
data.1-range-orders#1. Range Orders:
Use tight ranges as limit orders:
Set range above/below current price
Acts like a limit order
Earns fees while waiting
data.2-volatility-harvesting#2. Volatility Ha:
For volatile pairs:
Wide ranges during calm periods
Tight ranges during trends
Adjust based on momentum
data.3-multiple-positions#3. Multiple Positio:
Diversify across ranges:
Core position (wide range)
Satellite positions (tight ranges)
Different fee tiers
data.4-rebalancing-strategy#4. Rebalancing St:
Take profits from out-of-range positions
Redeploy at current prices
Compound earnings
data.what-it-is#What It Is:
Temporary loss vs holding
Occurs when prices change
Realized only on withdrawal
data.how-to-minimize#How to Minimize:
Choose correlated pairs
Use appropriate ranges
Earn enough fees to offset
Consider stable pairs
data.base-rate#Base Rate:
0.24 points per dollar per day
$1,000 position = 240 points/day
data.with-multipliers#With Multipliers:
Tier 2 (1.1x): 264 points/day
Tier 3 (1.2x): 288 points/day
Tier 4 (1.3x): 312 points/day
Tier 5 (1.5x): 360 points/day
data.optimization-tips#Optimization Tips:
Maintain positions for full days
Larger positions earn more
Active in high-volume pools
Compound earnings
data.too-narrow-ranges#Too Narrow Ranges:
Frequently out of range
Missing fee opportunities
High management overhead
data.ignoring-gas-costs#Ignoring Gas Costs:
Frequent adjustments eat profits
Batch operations when possible
data.wrong-pool-selection#Wrong Pool Selectio:
Low volume = low fees
Check historical data
Avoid dead pools
data.emotional-decisions#Emotional Decisions:
Panic adjusting
FOMO into pools
Ignoring plan
data.position-manager#Position Manager:
Track all positions
Fee calculator
Range visualizer
Historical performance
data.analytics#Analytics:
Pool APYs
Volume trends
Price charts
IL calculator
data.faqs#FAQs:
Q: How much should I start with?
A: $100 minimum, $1,000+ recommended for meaningful returnsQ: Can I lose money?
A: Yes, through impermanent loss, but fees often compensateQ: How often should I collect fees?
A: When fees > gas costs, typically weekly/monthlyQ: Best pool for beginners?
A: WHYPE/USDE with Â±30% range
data.next-steps#Next Steps:
Ready to dive deeper?
Managing Positions
Understanding Fees
Advanced LP Strategies
Calculating Returns

data.factory-functions#Factory Functions:

getPool(): Get pool address

exactInputSingle(): Swap exact input
exactOutputSingle(): Swap exact output
exactInput(): Multi-hop swap

mint(): Create new position
increaseLiquidity(): Add to position
decreaseLiquidity(): Remove from position
collect(): Collect fees
burn(): Close position

data: Welcome to the most rewarding DEX in the game! Here's everything you need to know about earning your slice of the $HX pie.
data.the-big-picture-#The Big Picture ğŸ¯:
Points = Your share of $HX tokens at launch. It's that simple!
Earn by trading ğŸ’±
Earn by providing liquidity ğŸ’§
Multiply with tiers ğŸ“ˆ
Convert to $HX at TGE ğŸª™
data.1-trading-points-#1. Trading Points âš¡:
Rate: 0.01 points per dollar traded
Minimum: $10 per trade to earn pointsEvery swap counts! Whether you're trading $10 or $10,000, you're earning.
data.2-liquidity-points-#2. Liquidity Points: Rate: 0.24 points per dollar per dayThis is where it gets juicy! Park your liquidity and earn while you sleep.
data.the-tier-system---level-up-#The Tier Sys: Your tier multiplies ALL your points. Higher tier = more points = more $HX!
data.-bronze-newcomer#ğŸ¥‰ Bronze: Newcomer:
Range: 0-999 points
Multiplier: 1.0x
Just getting started? We all were!
data.-silver-active-trader#ğŸ¥ˆ Silver: Activ:
Range: 1,000-9,999 points
Multiplier: 1.1x (+10%)
Nice! You're getting the hang of it
data.-gold-power-user#ğŸ¥‡ Gold: Power User:
Range: 10,000-49,999 points
Multiplier: 1.25x (+25%)
Now we're talking!
data.-platinum-defi-whale#ğŸ’ Platinum: DeFi:
Range: 50,000-99,999 points

data: This comprehensive guide covers everything you need to know about swapping tokens on hx.finance.
data.swap-interface-overview#Swap Interface O:
The hx.finance swap interface is designed for simplicity and efficiency:
Token Selectors: Choose your input and output tokens
Amount Fields: Enter how much to swap
Price Display: Real-time exchange rates
Details Panel: Transaction breakdown
data.direct-swaps#Direct Swaps:
Most common type - swapping between two tokens that have a direct pool:
WHYPE â†” USDE
UETH â†” USDE
UBTC â†” USDE
data.multi-hop-swaps#Multi-Hop Swaps:
Automatically routes through multiple pools for best price:
UETH â†’ USDE â†’ UBTC
The router finds the most efficient path
data.step-1-token-selection#Step 1: Token Sel:
Selecting "From" Token
Click the top token button
Search by name or symbol
View your balance
Recently used tokens appear first
Selecting "To" Token
Click the bottom token button
Only pairs with liquidity shown
Sort by volume or TVL
data.step-2-entering-amounts#Step 2: Entering:
Option A: Exact Input
Enter amount in top field
Output auto-calculates
Shows "Max" button for full balance
Option B: Exact Output
Enter desired amount in bottom field
Input amount auto-calculates
Useful for specific purchase amounts
data.step-3-price-information#Step 3: Price I:
Exchange Rate
Shows current rate (e.g., 1 WHYPE = 50.25 USDE)
Click to invert display
Updates in real-time
Price Impact
Percentage the price moves due to your trade
Green: < 0.1% (Excellent)
Yellow: 0.1% - 1% (Normal)
Orange: 1% - 3% (High)
Red: > 3% (Warning)
data.step-4-transaction-details#Step 4: Trans:
Minimum Received
Accounts for slippage tolerance
Guarantees you get at least this amount
Transaction fails if price moves too much
LP Fee
0.05% - Stable pairs
0.3% - Most pairs
1% - Exotic pairs
Route
Shows the path your swap takes
Direct or through intermediary tokens
data.slippage-protection#Slippage Protection:
Access via the âš™ï¸ settings icon:Auto Slippage (Recommended)
Dynamically adjusts based on volatility
Prevents failed transactions
Optimal for most users
Custom Slippage
Set your own tolerance
0.1% - 0.5%: Low volatility pairs
0.5% - 1%: Normal pairs
1% - 5%: High volatility
data.transaction-deadline#Transaction Deadlin:
Default: 30 minutes
Prevents hanging transactions
Adjust for volatile conditions
data.expert-mode#Expert Mode:
Enable for:
No confirmation popups
High slippage warnings disabled
Faster trading flow
âš ï¸ Use with caution
data.for-best-prices#For Best Prices:
Check Price Impact
Keep under 0.5% for best rates
Split large trades
Time Your Swaps
Monitor price charts
Set price alerts
Use Liquidity Indicators
Trade pairs with deep liquidity
Check 24h volume

data: All your burning questions about hx.finance, answered by the community.
data.what-exactly-is-hxfinance#What exactly i: We're the community-owned DEX on Hyperliquid! Think Uniswap, but faster, cheaper, and with a fair launch where YOU get 33% of the tokens. No VCs, no BS, just good vibes and great tech.
data.why-should-i-use-hxfinance-over-other-de:
Lightning fast âš¡ - Quick trades on Hyperliquid
Dirt cheap fees ğŸ’¸ - Gas costs are basically nothing
You earn points ğŸ† - Every trade gets you closer to $HX tokens
Fair launch ğŸ¤ - 33% to community, not to VCs
Part of an ecosystem ğŸŒ - Privacy tools and mobile apps coming!
data.is-it-safe#Is it safe?: Absolutely! We use battle-tested Uniswap V3 contracts, everything is non-custodial (you always control your funds), and the code is open source. Plus, no rug pulls here - we're too busy building! ğŸ› ï¸
data.which-wallets-can-i-use#Which wallets ca: Any EVM wallet works! MetaMask is our fave, but WalletConnect, Coinbase Wallet, Rainbow, and Trust Wallet all work great too.
data.what-tokens-can-i-trade#What tokens can:
Right now:
WHYPE - Wrapped HYPE (the OG)
USDE - Ethena's stablecoin
UETH - Wrapped ETH
UBTC - Wrapped Bitcoin
More coming soon! Got requests? Drop them in Discord!
data.what-are-the-fees#What are the fees?:
Super reasonable:
0.05% for stable pairs (like USDE/USDC)
0.3% for most pairs (the sweet spot)
1% for exotic stuff
All fees go to liquidity providers - that could be you! ğŸ‘€
data.why-did-my-trade-fail#Why did my trade f:
Usually one of these:
Not enough gas â†’ Keep 0.1 HYPE for fees
Slippage too low â†’ Bump it to 1-2%
Price moved â†’ Try again, prices update fast!
Need token approval â†’ One-time thing for new tokens
data.whats-slippage#What's slippage?:
It's how much price movement you'll accept. Think of it as your "price flexibility":
0.5% = "I want exactly this price"
1-2% = "A little wiggle room is fine"
5%+ = "Just get me those tokens!"
data.whats-concentrated-liquidity#What's conc: Instead of spreading your money across all prices (old school), you pick a price range. It's like fishing where the fish actually are instead of the whole ocean! ğŸ£
data.how-much-can-i-earn-as-an-lp#How much ca:
Depends on:
Volume ğŸ“Š - More trades = more fees
Your range ğŸ¯ - Tighter = higher returns (but needs more attention)
Competition ğŸ‘¥ - Your share of the pool
We've seen APYs from 20% to 200%+. Not financial advice, but... ğŸ‘€
data.whats-impermanent-loss#What's impermanen: It's when the tokens you deposited change price relative to each other. Only "real" when you withdraw. Good news: fee earnings often make up for it!
data.can-i-lose-money#Can I lose money?: Real talk: Yes, through impermanent loss or if you go out of range. But many LPs make bank from fees. Start small, learn the ropes!
data.how-do-points-work#How do points work?:
Simple:
Trading: 0.01 points per dollar
Liquidity: 0.24 points per dollar per day
Tiers: Multiply everything up to 1.5x!
$HX launches Soonâ„¢. We'll announce 30 days before. Follow our Twitter for the alpha!
data.can-i-buy-points#Can I buy points?: Nope! That's the "fair" in fair launch. Points only come from using the platform. No shortcuts, everyone plays by the same rules.
data.what-happens-to-my-points#What happens t: At TGE, your points convert to $HX tokens. Your share = your points Ã· total points Ã— 33% of supply. Math is beautiful! ğŸ§®
data.what-chain-is-this-on#What chain is this: Hyperliquid! Chain ID 999. It's the future - come join us!
data.how-do-i-add-hyperliquid-to-metamask#How: We auto-add it when you connect! But here's the info:
data.is-there-an-api#Is there an API?:
Yep! Subgraph endpoint for all your data needs:
https://api.goldsky.com/api/public/project_cmay1j7dh90w601r2hjv26a5b/subgraphs/moonswap-v3/hyperevm/gn
data.wheres-the-code#Where's the code?: GitHub coming soon! We're cleaning it up so it's pretty for you devs ğŸ’…
data.whats-innocenceis#What's innocence.is?: Our privacy layer! Trade privately without sacrificing speed or price. It's gonna be HUGE. Coming soon!
data.whats-hypermoon#What's HyperMoon?: Our mobile trading app! Already live on Android, iOS coming. Trade from anywhere with pro features.
data.are-there-nfts#Are there NFTs?: Two collections dropping soon! Real utility, not just JPEGs. Think governance, fee discounts, and more!

data.got-scammed#Got scammed?: Sorry friend ğŸ˜¢ Report it in Discord so we can warn others. Unfortunately, blockchain transactions can't be reversed.
